note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Prosperity gap
subtitle: Average factor by which incomes need to be multiplied to bring everyone to the prosperity standard of $25 per person per day. This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
